content: आवेगः {@--1@} Uneasiness, anxiety, excitement, agitation, flurry; अलमावेगेन <ls>Ś. 3</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">7</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 83</ls>; शोक°, दुःख°, साध्वस° &c. {@--2@} Hurry, haste; <ls>Ś. 4.</ls> {@--3@} Agitation, regarded as one of the 33 subordinate feelings. --गी <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (वृद्धदारकवृक्ष).
